tuv.seg: Moving your children to secondary school
Do pháisté a aistriú chuig meánscoil Éireannach
The Irish secondary (also known as post-primary) school cycle is generally 5 or 6 years long
De ghnáth tá an timthiall meánscolaíochta (ar a dtugtar iarscoile freisin) 5 nó 6 bhliana ar a fhad in Éirinn
Children begin their secondary school studies around the age of 12 and leave around the age of 17 or 18, having taken 2 State exams in that period
Tosnaíonn páistí sa mheánscoil thart ar dhá bhliain déag d'aois agus críochnaíonn siad ag 17 nó 18, tar éis dóibh 2 scrúdú Stáit a dhéanamh sa tréimhse sin
The minimum school leaving age is 16 years or the completion of 3 years of post-primary education, whichever is the later
Is an íosaois fágála scoile é 16 bliana nó críochnú 3 bliana oideachais iar-bhunscoile, pé ceann is deireanaí
Most schools offer students the option of a Transition Year after they have completed the first 3 years of secondary education
Baineann cuid de na scoileanna deis as an Idirbhliain le sos a thabhairt do na mic léinn ó na scrúduithe Stáit tar éis dóibh an chéad 3 bhliain a chur i gcrích
This allows students to explore non-academic interests, whether they are social, creative or linked to the world of business
Tugann seo seans don mhac léinn breathnú ar na hábhair eile neamh-acadúla, bíodh siad sóisialta, cruthaitheacha nó bainteach le saol an ghnó
At the end of the first 3 years students sit the Junior Certificate examination and after that they may choose from 3 different Leaving Certificate programmes

Ag deireadh an chéad 3 bhliain oideachais meánscolaíochta, déanann na mic léinn an scrúdú Teastais Sóisearach agus ansin tá 3 chlár don Ardteistiméireacht gur féidir leis na mic léinn a rogha ceann a phiocadh

They can take the traditional (established) Leaving Certificate or they can choose from the Leaving Certificate Vocational Programme or the Leaving Certificate Applied Programme, both of which focus on a student's more practical and technical abilities

Is féidir leo an Ardteistiméireacht (bunaithe) traidisiúnta a dhéanamh nó is féidir leo an Clár Gairmiúil don Ardteistiméireacht nó an Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach a roghnú. Cuireann an dá chlár sin béim ar chumas praiticiúil nó teicniúil an mhic léinn
More information on secondary education is in our document, Starting post-primary school
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise faoi oideachas meánscolaíochta inár ndoiciméad, Tosú ar iar-bhunscoil
The Irish secondary school year stretches from the first week in September to the first week in June
Tosaíonn an bhliain scoile don dara leibhéal ón gcéad seachtain i Meán Fómhair go dtí an chéad seachtain sa Mheitheamh
If your child is going into a Junior Certificate Class or a Leaving Certificate class, however, they will not finish until later in June, as they will be taking their exams at that time
Má tá do pháiste ag dul isteach i rang an Teastais Shóisearaigh nó i rang na hArdteistiméireachta ní chríochnóidh sé/sí go dtí deireadh an Mheithimh mar beidh na scrúduithe le déanamh ag an am sin
The types of schools available
Na cineálacha scoileanna atá ar fáil
The post-primary school system includes secondary schools, vocational schools, community or comprehensive schools and fee-paying secondary schools
Meánscoileanna, scoileanna gairmoideachais, scoileanna pobail agus cuimsitheacha agus scoileanna táillí iad na scoileanna dara leibhéil
The majority of Irish children go to secondary schools, which are privately owned and managed and often run by religious orders, although the teachers in these schools are generally lay staff

Bíonn formhór páistí na hÉireann ag freastal ar meánscoileanna a bhfuil úinéirí príobháideacha acu agus atá dhá bhainistiú agus rite ag oird rialta, ach is iondúil gur múinteoirí tuata iad an fhoireann
The majority of secondary schools are free, but there are also fee-paying schools
Níl aon táillí le híoc le formhór na meánscoileanna ach tá cuid mhaith scoileanna príobháideacha gur gá táillí a íoc leo freisin ann
Vocational schools and community or comprehensive schools are all free
Níl aon táillí le híoc le gairmscoileanna ná le scoileanna pobail agus cuimsitheacha
These schools tend to provide both academic and technical education and they often provide additional further education opportunities for school-leavers and adults in the local community

Cuireann na scoileanna seo oideachas acadúil agus teicniúil ar fáil agus go minic bíonn siad ag cur oideachais bhreise ar fáil do dhaoine atá ag fágáil na scoile agus do dhaoine fásta sa phobal áitiúil
There are a small number of private international schools in Ireland including a French school, a Japanese school and a German school
Tá roinnt bheag scoileanna idirnáisiúnta príobháideacha in Éirinn ina measc scoil Fhrancach, scoil Sheapánach agus scoil Ghearmánach
Choosing a school and enrolling your child
Scoil a roghnú agus do pháiste a chlárú
You can get a list of Irish schools on a county-by-county basis from the Department of Education and Skills
Is féidir liosta scoileanna na hÉireann de réir contae a fháil ón Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna
You should gather as much information as possible about the schools in which you are interested
Ba cheart duit an oiread eolais agus is féidir leat a fháil faoi na scoileanna a bhfuil spéis agat iontu

Schools can vary quite considerably in the ways in which they operate and the emphasis they put on areas such as exams, sports, the arts, personal development, religion, social affairs, European languages and practical skills acquisition

Is féidir difríochtaí móra a bheith idir scoileanna ina modhanna oibre agus sa bhéim a leagann siad ar scrúduithe, spóirt, ealaín, forbairt phearsanta, creideamh, gnóthaí sóisialta, teangacha na hEorpa, scileanna praiticiúla
Talk to teachers and, if possible, to other parents in order to see whether the school is likely to meet the needs of your particular child
Labhair le múinteoirí agus más féidir le tuismitheoirí eile le breathnú an bhfuil an scoil le bheith feiliúnach do na riachtanais atá ag do pháiste
Some schools will have a waiting list
Beidh liosta feithimh ag roinnt scoileanna
You will need to investigate the enrolment policy of the school in which you are interested and in general you should plan the enrolment of your child well in advance
Ní mór duit an polasaí iontrála atá ag an scoil a fhiosrú agus d'fhéadfadh sé a bheith riachtanach go ndéanfaidh tú clárú do pháiste i do rogha scoil a phleanáil cuid mhaith roimh an am

If you are planning to remain abroad and to send your child to an Irish school as an overseas student, you can choose from a range of fee-paying secondary schools (such as a boarding school or a day secondary school) that arrange accommodation and guardianship, as appropriate

Má tá sé i gceist agat féin fanacht thar lear agus do pháiste a chur chuig scoil Éireannach mar mhac léinn ón iasacht, is féidir leat rogha a dhéanamh idir réimse meánscoileanna táillí (mar shampla, scoil chónaithe nó meánscoil lae) a dhéanann socruithe maidir le lóistín baile agus caomhnú mar is cuí
If your child wishes to go to university or another third-level institution, they will need to score enough points in their Leaving Certificate exams
Más mian le do pháiste freastal ar ollscoil nó ar institiúid thríú leibhéil eile, is gá dó/dí dóthain pointí a fháil i scrúdú na hArdteistiméireachta
They will receive points for the 6 best grades they receive with the highest points going to an A1 in a paper at Honours level
Tá pointí ar fáil don 6 ghrád is fearr a fhaigheann mac léinn agus na pointí is airde ar fáil don ghrád A1 i scrúdú ag an Ard leibhéal
Most students take 7 subjects in the Leaving Certificate
Go hiondúil déanann na mic léinn staidéar ar 7 n-ábhar san Ardteistiméireacht
The points they need for third-level courses will depend on the subject they wish to study
Braitheann na pointí a theastaíonn don tríú leibhéal ar an ábhar staidéir a roghnaíonn an mac léinn
More information on going to third-level education is in our document, Application procedures and entry requirements
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise faoi oideachas tríú leibhéil inár ndoiciméad, Córas iarratais agus riachtanais iontrála coláistí
Education in State-funded second-level schools is free
Tá an t-oideachas na meánscoileanna maoinithe ag an Stát saor in aisce
The costs of fee-paying secondary schools can vary considerably
Bíonn an-difríocht idir na táillí a ghearrann meánscoileanna táillí
You will need to check with each individual school
Ní mór an cás a phlé leis an scoil atá i gceist
Whatever school you choose, you will need to pay for school books and, where appropriate, school uniforms
Pé scoil a roghnaíonn tú, beidh ort leabhair scoile a cheannach agus culaith éadaigh nuair is gá a cheannach freisin
Usually, you will also have to pay for extra-curricular activities
Go hiondúil bíonn táille le híoc ar aon imeachtaí taobh amuigh den ghnáthchuraclam
Apply directly to the school in which you are interested, as early as possible and ask about their enrolment policy
Cuir iarratas díreach chuig an scoil a bhfuil spéis agat inti, go maith in am roimh thús na scoilbhliana ach faigh cóip den pholasaí iontrála atá ag an scoil
Some schools may ask your child to sit an entrance exam, for which they will charge a fee
Bíonn scrúdú iontrála ag roinnt scoileanna don pháiste agus beidh táille le n-íoc don scrúdú seo a dhéanamh
